virtual void sxsdk::attribute_interface::accepts_shape_type ( bool &  accept,
enums::shape_type  shape_type,
sxsdk::shape_class &  shape 
) [inline, virtual]

Overridable. When waiting for an object type of ask_shape of shape_type, the argument accept is set to true.

blah

Parameters:
accept Set to true when waiting for a ask_shape call.
shape_type The object type of the selected object.
shape The sxsdk::shape_class of the selected object. For multiple objects, get scene_interface and get the selection info from scene_interface::active_shape() or scene_interface::get_active_shapes().

virtual bool sxsdk::attribute_interface::ask_camera ( camera_interface *  camera,
int  i,
void *  aux = 0 
) [inline, virtual]

Overridable. Called when selected from the Camera window Info pop-up menu.

If any change (including the custom attribute stream) occurs in the scene returns true; otherwise returns false.

Parameters:
camera camera_interface of the selected camera is passed.
i The number of the selected camera is passed
virtual bool sxsdk::attribute_interface::ask_distant_light ( sxsdk::distant_light_interface *  light,
int  i,
void *  aux = 0 
) [inline, virtual]

Overridable. Called when selected from the Distant Light Info pop-up menu. To display it on the menu, override accepts_distant_light().

Including the custom attribute stream, if any change in the scene occurs returns true; otherwise returns false.

Parameters:
light distant_light_interface is passed.
i The number of the selected Distant Light is passed.
virtual bool sxsdk::attribute_interface::ask_mapping ( mapping_layer_class &  mapping,
void *  aux = 0 
) [inline, virtual]

Overridable. Called when selected from the Surface Mapping Info pop-up menu. To display on the menu, override ask_mapping().

Including the Custom stream, if any change occurs in the Shade scene returns true; otherwise returns false.

Parameters:
mapping The mapping_layer_class of the selected mapping layer is passed.
virtual bool sxsdk::attribute_interface::ask_shape ( sxsdk::shape_class &  shape,
void *  aux = 0 
) [inline, virtual]

Overridable. Called when selected from the Custom Info menu. To display on the menu, override accepts_shape().

If any change (including the object's custom stream) occurs in the scene returns true; otherwise returns false.

Parameters:
shape The sxsdk::shape_class of the selected object. For multiple objects, get scene_interface and get the selection info from scene_interface::active_shape() or scene_interface::get_active_shapes().

) [inline, virtual]

Parameters:
info the data generated with new_custom_element_info.
shape sxsdk::shape_class of the target object for ray intersection is passed
lw the local to world coordinate matrix
wl the world to local coordinate matrix
i the element number, from 0 to the number of elements minus one. The number of elements is set with get_number_of_elements().

virtual custom_element_info_base_class* sxsdk::attribute_interface::new_custom_element_info ( sxsdk::shape_class &  shape,
const sxsdk::mat4 &  lw,
const sxsdk::mat4 &  wl,
int  i 
) [inline, virtual]

Overridable. Generates the necessary info for ray intersection calculations.

Creates a custom_element_info_base_class derived class, and returns that pointer.

blah

The object pointer generated here is passed as an argument to get_bounding_box() and ray_intersection().

blah

Deleted automatically when rendering finishes.

If it is not necessary to save info for the ray intersection calculation there is no need to override new_custom_element_info()

Return the custom_element_info_base_class derived class

Parameters:
shape sxsdk::shape_class of the target object for the ray intersection is passed.
lw the local to world coordinate matrix
wl the world to local coordinate matrix
i the element number, from 0 to the number of elements minus one. The number of elements is set with get_number_of_elements().
virtual custom_element_info_base_class* sxsdk::attribute_interface::new_per_thread_info ( sxsdk::shape_class &  shape,
int  i,
int  j 
) [inline, virtual]

Overridable. generates the necessary info for the ray intersection in thread units.

creates a custom_element_info_base_class derived class and passes that pointer.

blah

blah

Parameters:
i the element number, from 0 to the number of elements minus one. The number of elements is set with get_number_of_elements().
j the thread number
virtual int sxsdk::attribute_interface::ray_intersection ( const custom_element_info_base_class *  info,
sxsdk::shape_class &  shape,
const sxsdk::mat4 &  lw,
const sxsdk::mat4 &  wl,
int  i,
const sxsdk::vec3 &  o,
const sxsdk::vec3 &  d,
intersection_class  intersections[],
custom_element_info_base_class *  per_thread_info,
void *  aux = 0 
) [inline, virtual]

Overridable. Does the ray intersection calculation. (See also: Memory-Resident Plugins).

Called for objects that get passed the plugin ID to to the argument intersection_id by sxsdk::shape_class::create_attribute_stream_interface_with_uuid()

blah

Parameters:
info the data generated by new_custom_element_info()
shape the sxsdk::shape_class of the target object for the ray intersection gets passed
lw the local to world coordinate matrix
wl the world to local coordinate matrix
i the element number, from 0 to the number of elements minus one. The number of elements is set with get_number_of_elements().
o the ray starting position
d the ray unit vector
intersections blah
per_thread_info the data generated by new_per_thread_info()
